headline: 1 Magnificent Growth ETF That Could Turn $400 Per Month Into $1.4 Million While Barely Lifting a Finger
summary: As the stock market continues to surge, right now can be a fantastic time to invest.  The current bull market is still going strong, and the S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) has soared by nearly 26% so far this year.  If you're looking for a simpler way to supercharge your savings, investing in an exchange-traded fund (ETF) can be a smart choice.
